extendedInfo.description: Current only support English and Chinese. If you need other language, pls download iKeyboard EX version. Thanks!iPhone 5 Keyboard Emulator is an iPhone iOS 6 UI keyboard and inputmethod. Very cool UI like iOS 6 and easy to use. You can type faster and easier with an iPhone keyboard layout,particularly helpful for people who are used to an iPhone keyboard. You can get the Exciting  iPhone user experience in Android Phone!Major Feature:- Support iPhone iOS 6 UI Style and layout- Support iPhone Keyboard feature- Support same look and touch feeling with iPhone- Support switch between upper case and lower case- Support English and Chinese input- Support a variety of symbols - Support landscape and portrait input - Support number and browser input modeIf you meet any issue, pls don't just rate one star. We hope your email the issue to hidevstudio(at)gmail.com, we will definitely feedback and resolve your issue asap.Or follow usFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/HiDevStudioTwitter:https://twitter.com/hidevstudioTag: iPhone Style, iOS, Keyboard, InputmethodEnjoy it!This app is ad-supported. Search for 'iPhone 5 Keyboard Emulator Pro' for ad-free version.Note: Currently only support Android4.0 and above version!You can get more iPhone Style and Android capability Apps in "Hi Dev Studio".Thanks!
